record.dc:title: 165BN74 Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 84BN62. Adult male in good condition, extended burial, head west, on back, arms at sides. Stratum I, bottom; in pit. Square 19R10. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: Note broken left femur. I would expect a pit from above with this burial - but could not find an origin at plowline, neither does my profile show a pit coming from above. The burial is certainly atypical.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has illustrations of burial on file.
